data.title: Unparalleled Legal
data.subtitle: Sterling & Roe delivers strategic counsel for complex corporate and financial matters. We are the architects of legal solutions for the modern economy.

data.title: Our Expertise
data.subtitle: Strategic Corporate & Financial Law
data.description: Our practice is built on a foundation of deep industry knowledge and a commitment to achieving our clients' strategic objectives.

items.name: Mergers & Acquisitions
items.description: Navigating high-stakes transactions with precision, from due diligence to closing.

items.name: Securities Law
items.description: Advising public and private companies on compliance, offerings, and regulatory matters.

items.name: Intellectual Property
items.description: Protecting and monetizing your most valuable intangible assets with strategic counsel.

data.title: Client Endorsements
data.subtitle: Trusted by Industry Leaders
data.description: We are proud to be the trusted advisors for innovators and market leaders.

items.quote: Sterling & Roe's guidance during our international merger was invaluable. Their strategic insight and meticulous execution were critical to our success. They are in a class of their own.
items.author: CEO, Global Tech Inc.

items.quote: The IP team at Sterling & Roe is second to none. They secured our patent portfolio and developed a licensing strategy that created a significant new revenue stream for our company.
items.author: Founder, InnovateX

data.title: Contact Our Firm
data.subtitle: A Direct Line to Our Team
data.description: For inquiries regarding representation, please reach out via our primary channels.

data.title: Showcase Every
data.subtitle: This page demonstrates every available component in the modular system. Use this as a guide to see how each section can be customized and ordered.

data.title: Features Component
data.subtitle: Display Key Features
data.description: This section is perfect for highlighting the main selling points, services, or benefits of your product or company.

items.name: Customizable Icons
items.description: Each feature can have a unique icon, selected from the icon library.

items.name: Flexible Grid
items.description: The grid automatically adjusts to the number of feature items you provide.

items.name: Engaging Titles
items.description: Use a main title, a subtitle, and a description to frame your features.

data.title: Testimonials Component
data.subtitle: Build Social Proof
data.description: Showcase positive reviews and quotes from happy customers or clients to build trust and credibility.

items.quote: This is where a glowing review from a happy customer would go. It's an essential part of building trust with new visitors.
items.author: Satisfied Client

items.quote: You can add as many testimonials as you need. The layout will adapt to show them in a clean, two-column grid.
items.author: Another User

data.title: Plans/Pricing Component
data.description: This component can be used for pricing tables, service tiers, or any kind of feature comparison between different options.

plans.name: Basic Tier
plans.description: A description for the basic plan.

plans.name: Popular Tier
plans.description: A description for the most popular plan.

plans.name: Enterprise Tier
plans.description: A description for the enterprise plan.

data.title: Contact Component
data.subtitle: Show All Contact Methods
data.description: Display all available social media and contact links. The component will only show the icons for the links you provide.

data.title: Call To Action Component
data.subtitle: This is a simple, bold section designed to get the user to take one specific action.

data.title: Muestra Cada
data.subtitle: Esta página demuestra cada componente disponible en el sistema modular. Úsala como guía para ver cómo cada sección puede ser personalizada y ordenada.

data.title: Componente de Características
data.subtitle: Muestra las Características Clave
data.description: Esta sección es perfecta para resaltar los principales puntos de venta, servicios o beneficios de tu producto o empresa.

items.name: Iconos Personalizables
items.description: Cada característica puede tener un ícono único, seleccionado de la biblioteca de íconos.

items.name: Grilla Flexible
items.description: La grilla se ajusta automáticamente al número de ítems de características que proporciones.

items.name: Títulos Atractivos
items.description: Usa un título principal, un subtítulo y una descripción para enmarcar tus características.

data.title: Componente de Testimonios
data.subtitle: Construye Prueba Social
data.description: Muestra reseñas positivas y citas de clientes felices para construir confianza y credibilidad.

items.quote: Aquí iría una reseña brillante de un cliente feliz. Es una parte esencial para construir confianza con nuevos visitantes.
items.author: Cliente Satisfecho

items.quote: Puedes agregar tantos testimonios como necesites. El diseño se adaptará para mostrarlos en una grilla limpia de dos columnas.
items.author: Otro Usuario

data.title: Componente de Planes/Precios
data.description: Este componente se puede usar para tablas de precios, niveles de servicio o cualquier tipo de comparación de características entre diferentes opciones.

plans.name: Nivel Básico
plans.description: Una descripción para el plan básico.

plans.name: Nivel Popular
plans.description: Una descripción para el plan más popular.

plans.name: Nivel Empresarial
plans.description: Una descripción para el plan empresarial.

data.title: Componente de Contacto
data.subtitle: Muestra Todos los Métodos de Contacto
data.description: Muestra todos los enlaces de redes sociales y contacto disponibles. El componente solo mostrará los íconos para los enlaces que proporciones.

data.title: Componente de Llamada a la Acción
data.subtitle: Esta es una sección simple y audaz diseñada para que el usuario realice una acción específica.
